item.description: 2022-08-25 1 ../../../../../install/bin/riscv32-unknown-elf-gdb eh1.elf -ex 'source ../../../../../install/share/gdb/python/gdb/ovlymgr.py' -ex 'tar rem 192.168.0.134:3333' -ex load -ex 'b main.c:82' -ex When I run:

item.title: Software Overlay Standard
item.description: Software Overlay Standard To solve the limited memory issue with embedded systems, we use virtual memory. Meaning the OS will use a hardware MMU (Memory Management Unit) with direct mapping between the virtual and physical memory.
